text: @realDonaldTrump Please start your rallies again. Every state that have opened up! Start going around doing pic-ops shaking hands and show the peoole you are above the Covid-19 vius! Youythe Chose one. So nothing bad will happen to you! Get out there. Your reelection is at stake!!
